title: Video Short
description: Responsive video wrapper for Illinois Toolkit proportioned for YouTube shorts.
notes: Known issues: slotted iframe may fail to load in certain cases (https://github.com/web-illinois/ilw-video/issues/12). Workaround: Define video using component attributes.

samples.name: short
samples.description: Overriding the default aspect ratio for a single YouTube short.
samples.text: <iframe width="467" height="831" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/6kIIFYwIU5w" title="Cheers to the start of an #ILLINOIS summer ☀️ #summer #solstice #shorts" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>

samples.name: short (dimensionless)
samples.description: Overriding the default dimensions for a single YouTube short.
samples.text: <iframe src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/6kIIFYwIU5w" title="Cheers to the start of an #ILLINOIS summer ☀️ #summer #solstice #shorts" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>

attributes.name: aspectratio
attributes.description: Override the aspect ratio variable on a single item.

css-variables.name: --ilw-video--aspect-ratio
css-variables.description: Aspect ratio of the embedded video.
